description:
Job Description

JOB TITLE:

Logistics Coordinator

REPORTS TO: Senior Purchaser

JOB PURPOSE: The basic functions of the Logistics Coordinator is the receiving, maintenance, Safeguarding, and releasing of Company project materials inventory validity, control and when required; delivery.

DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Receive materials and supplies and ensure that accompanying documentation is correct and complete.
  • File and distribute all inventory documentation.
  • When releasing supplies or materials, ensure that accompanying documentation is correct and complete.
  • Physically inventory all received shipments for accuracy of product vs PO and shipping documents.
  • On a weekly basis, audit inventory (10%) to assure that it is intact and safeguarded.
  • Ensure inventory security and control to avoid theft or unauthorized use at any time.
  • Create and maintain electronic borrow logs across projects.
  • Create and maintain electronic received log.
  • Create and maintain electronic daily received report, release report daily to all foreman and higher, organized by project.
  • Ensure all project materials are stored by project, organized and accessible for issue.
  • Ensure the storage areas are clean and free of debris.
  • Ensure the warehouse area is clean and free of debris.
  • Ensure the yard is secured at all times and gate is closed when not in use.
  • When requested, train other employees.
  • When necessary and requested by supervisor, assist other office personnel.
  • Perform all other tasks assigned by supervisor.

Collaboration:

  • Live out the Powerful family’s Management Team DNA and GPS:
  • Clear and Open Communication
  • You Can Count on Me
  • Respect for Everyone’s Role and Contribution
  • Willing to Adapt and Change
  • Concierge-Level Service
  • Light-Hearted Approach
  • Perform additional tasks, as needed at the direction of the CFO.

Expectations:

  • Exhibit a professional, business-like appearance and demeanor.
  • Entrepreneurial mindset that’s hard-wired toward learning, change and self-awareness.
  • Create a positive work environment and develop positive working relationships with others — staff, clients, and vendors.
  • Adherence to laws and best practices in regards to dealing with clients and data
  • Comfortable dealing with numbers and the processing of financial information
  • Results-driven and patient
  • High degree of attention to detail and trustworthiness
  • Ability to be resilient, flexible and responsive to the changing needs of the business, the industry and clients.
  • Maintain inventory validity and control
  • Ability to collaborate with leadership team, management team and staff to ensure ongoing growth and profitability of the company.
  • Take initiative in troubleshooting and problem solving with a solutions-based focus.
  • Ability to work both independently and within a team.
  • Ability to prioritize and reprioritize as needed to achieve expected results — for self and others.
  • Analytical and observational skills that demonstrate an ability to work unsupervised, follow company policy, and interact effectively with employees and clients.
  • Develop and maintain positive relationships with vendors that will result in high quality and cost effective products and services.
  • Keep leadership informed about best practices by reviewing and analyzing special reports, summarizing information, and identifying trends that can support ongoing improvement of office operations.
  • Model accountability, measure progress and hold yourself accountable for desired results.
  • Maintain a high level of confidentiality

Knowledge & Skills:

The use of analytical and observational skills which demonstrate an ability to compile reports and interact with coworkers in sometimes stressful situations. Must have a working knowledge of Microsoft office to include intermediate Excel skills.

  • Excellent written and oral communications skills, including:
  • Fluent in English: Speaking, Understanding, Reading and Writing.

Be a problem­ solver who has a demonstrated ability to overcome challenges with creative solutions

  • Detail oriented with strong organizational skills.
  • Natural ability to think several steps ahead of logistical requierments and take proactive steps to address roadblocks and issues
  • Industry-specific, including: Familiarity with the construction industry, electrical contractors and related terminology is desirable, but not required.
  • Understanding of general project management procedures, logistics supply cycle and budgeting.
  • Ability to be flexible and understand the needs of the business often dictate the need for immediate change
  • Working knowledge of Spanish is desirable, but not required.

Qualifications

Education:

High school or Equivalent

Experience:

  • Four years proven experience in general supply or logistics function
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Preferred: Two years or more in a logistics coordination function or expeditor / purchaser function in the electrical construction or general construction industry military or government logistics functions.

Working conditions:

  • Fast-paced environment requiring flexibility, adaptability and resilience in a wide variety of work situations.
  • Nature of business results in many tight or continually changing deadlines.
  • General office environment, with low to medium noise, low to medium heat and cold, and low to medium dust levels.

Physical requirements:

  • Body Positions: Standing and sitting
  • Body Movements: Walking, stooping and bending
  • Sensory Abilities: Sighted, voiced, and hearing. Close, color and peripheral vision with the ability to adjust eye focus
  • Lifting: Low to high- up to 80 lbs
  • Reasonable accommodations to fulfill the essential task for this position shall be made for individuals with disabilities

Company Description

Powerfull Electric Inc. is an electrical contracting company dedicated to providing luxury residential homeowners with revolutionary technologically advanced electrical systems.

We provide white glove service, unmatched quality and custom craftsmanship for our clients both during construction and the lifespan of your estate.

Our employees are our backbone and they are the technical experts in all aspects of design, development, planning, executing and administration of all your electrical needs.

We are POWERFULL ELECTRIC!

Powerfull Electric Inc. is an electrical contracting company dedicated to providing luxury residential homeowners with revolutionary technologically advanced electrical systems. We provide white glove service, unmatched quality and custom craftsmanship for our clients both during construction and the lifespan of your estate. Our employees are our backbone and they are the technical experts in all aspects of design, development, planning, executing and administration of all your electrical needs. We are POWERFULL ELECTRIC!
